text: Virginia Ruano Pascual was the defending champion, but decided to compete in Moscow at the same week. Nicole Vaidišová won the title by defeating Virginie Razzano 5–7, 6–3, 6–2 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Official results archive (ITF) * Official results archive (WTA) Tashkent Open - Singles Category:2004 Tashkent Open
title: 2004 Tashkent Open – Singles
